name: materialize-vue
description: A high quality component library based on materialize & vue 2.x
author: vue-materialize

scripts.build:theme: rimraf lib/theme-default && rimraf packages/theme-default/lib && gulp build --gulpfile ./build/bin/build-style.js && cp-cli packages/theme-default/lib lib/theme-default
scripts.build:utils: cross-env BABEL_ENV=utils babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/index.js
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf packages/*/lib && rimraf test/**/coverage && lerna clean --yes
scripts.dev: npm run bootstrap && npm run build:file && webpack-dev-server --content-base ./document --inline --watch --hot --config ./build/webpack.dev.conf.js --quiet --info=false
scripts.dev:play: npm run build:file && cross-env PLAY_ENV=true webpack-dev-server --content-base ./playground --inline --watch --hot --config ./build/webpack.dev.conf.js --info=false
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:file && npm run lint && webpack --config ./build/webpack.common.conf.js --progress && webpack --config ./build/webpack.component.conf.js --progress && webpack --config ./build/webpack.prod.conf.js --progress && npm run build:utils && npm run build:theme
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:file && cross-env NODE_ENV='production' webpack --config ./build/webpack.dev.conf.js && echo mvui.savoygu.com>>document/mvui/CNAME
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:build && gh-pages -d document/mvui --remote origin && rimraf document/mvui
scripts.pub: npm run bootstrap && sh buid/git-release.sh && sh build/release.sh
scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env BABEL_ENV=test karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js,.vue src document packages build test/unit/specs
